Specimen Type(s): non-fastidious Gram-negative and Gram-positive aerobic bacteria
Methodologies: Minimum Inhibitory Concentration (MIC) determination on agar media
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ETEST® Sulbactam/Durlobactam manual antimicrobial susceptibility test strip for MIC determination of Sulbactam/Durlobactam against Acinetobacter baumannii-calcoaceticus complex
Indications for Use Summary: Manual quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility and MIC of Sulbactam/Durlobactam for non-fastidious Gram-negative and Gram-positive aerobic bacteria and fastidious bacteria, including Acinetobacter baumannii-calcoaceticus complex.
